comment: This is a rectangular text box containing Chinese characters in an ancient script (likely seal script), arranged vertically in columns. The text includes both large characters and smaller annotations, typical of classical Chinese dictionaries or linguistic texts such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The box has a thick black border on three sides (top, left, bottom) and appears to be part of a printed page from an old book. The right edge shows some ink smudging or wear, possibly due to aging or printing imperfections.
